description:
misc/emacs: Fix the gofmt patching when the TMPDIR is not the default.

The previous code assumed the gofmt output referred to /tmp but
that's not true if TMPDIR points somewhere else (like on Macs).
Fixes issue 3782.

that's not true if TMPDIR points somewhere else (like on Macs).
Fixes issue 3782.
